message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Considering its quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than $100. Would you be interested in purchasing it? Let's discuss a fair price that reflects its true value.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $100 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. Given the high demand and exceptional quality of our product, I would like to propose a price of $115. This price still offers a reasonable profit margin while acknowledging your budget constraints.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I must stick to my budget. I am unable to increase my offer beyond $100. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.

I understand your position, Bob. In light of our previous discussions, I am willing to consider a price of $110 for the product. This allows for a slight compromise while still providing a reasonable profit margin. I hope this aligns better with your budget.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I am still unable to exceed $100 for the product. Could we possibly meet at $105?

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. Considering the value and quality of our product, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $108 for the product. This allows for a bit more flexibility within your budget while still ensuring a decent profit margin for us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am very close to meeting my budget constraints. Could we possibly meet at $107?

I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my needs, Bob. I am willing to accept a price of $109 for the product. This slightly exceeds your latest proposal, but it also ensures a reasonable profit margin for us. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am very close to my budget limit. Could we possibly agree on $106 for the product?
